requirement.summary: The SWID tag is schema valid
requirement.statement: When producing SWID tags, tag creators MUST produce SWID tags that conform to all requirements defined in the ISO/IEC 19770-2:2015 specification.

derived-requirement.statement: All SWID tag instances MUST pass a validating parse with no errors prior to performing any other processing.

requirement.statement: The <SoftwareIdentity> element MUST specify an @xml:lang attribute with a non-blank value to indicate the default human language used for expressing all language-dependent attribute values.

derived-requirement.statement: The <SoftwareIdentity> element MUST specify an @xml:lang attribute with a non-blank value.
derived-requirement.message: The <SoftwareIdentity> element does not specify an @xml:lang attribute.

derived-requirement.statement: The <SoftwareIdentity> element MUST specify a non-blank @xml:lang attribute value.
derived-requirement.message: The <SoftwareIdentity> element does not specify a non-blank @xml:lang attribute value.

requirement.summary: The default language of the target platform is specified
requirement.statement: When specifying a value for the <SoftwareIdentity> @xml:lang attribute, non-authoritative tag creators SHOULD use the language tag corresponding to the default language of the device where the tagged product resides.
